Package avdta.network.link

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbstractSplitLink
    This interface should be implemented by any Link subclass with a TransitLane
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CACCLTMLink
    This models the cooperative adaptive cruise control, which has several effects on vehicle behavior.
    CentroidConnector
    This represents a centroid connector, which connects a Intersection to a Zone or vice versa.
    ChainedArray
    This is used to store and retrieve the cumulative counts for the last T time steps.
    CTMLink  
    DLRCTMLink  
    FixedSizeLL Deprecated
    Link
    An abstract DTA link.
    LinkRecord
    This class represents and manipulates the data used to construct Links
    LTMLink
    This class implements the link transmission model.
    PQLink
    This is a point queue flow model.
    SharedTransitCTMLink
    This is a CTMLink with a dynamic transit lane, which adds lanes to cells when transit is not present.
    SplitCTMLink
    This is a normal CTMLink that has a dedicated transit lane
    TransitLane
    A standard CTMLink that is usable only by transit.
